tr_welcomeDesc: Misaotra anao namorona kaonty! Tena faly izahay hoe hampiasa ny programa Organized ianao. Jereo ity video fampidirana ity dia ho hitanao fa hanamora ny asa tokony ataonao ity programa ity:
tr_watchVideoLabel: Hijery ny video ao amin’ny YouTube
tr_moreInfoGuideLabel: Fanampiana, ahitanao tsipiriany momba ny fampiasana azy
tr_moreInfoBlogLabel: Vaovao, ahitanao soso-kevitra sy fanampiana hafa
tr_moreInfoSupportLabel: Hanohana an’ity programa ity amin’ny alalan’ny fanomezana
tr_loginDesc: Naharay fangatahana avy aty amin’ity adiresinao ity izahay mba hidirana amin’ny programa Organized. Tsindrio ny rohy eto ambany raha hiditra.
tr_loginAltText: Raha tsy mandeha ny rohy eo ambony, dia ampiasao ity eto ambany ity. Jereo tsara sao misy tapaka ilay izy rehefa mandika ilay izy ianao:
tr_loginIgnoreText: Azonao fafana fotsiny ity hafatra ity raha tsy nangataka an’io rohy io ianao.
